sentences.en: ...giant submarines able to travel at high speeds underwater.
sentences.cn: …能在水下高速行驶的巨型潜艇。

sentences.en: A game that is very popular with these young swimmers is the underwater tricycle race.
sentences.cn: 这些幼小的游泳运动员非常喜爱的一项运动就是水下三轮车比赛.

sentences.en: A pool of clear water is lit by underwater lights.
sentences.cn: 一池碧水被水下的灯光照亮。

sentences.en: Local fishermen's nets kept snagging on underwater objects.
sentences.cn: 当地渔民的渔网老是被水下的东西钩住。

sentences.en: Much of our oil, gas, and minerals also come from underwater.
sentences.cn: 许多石油 、 天然气与矿物亦是取自海里.

sentences.en: Our underwater explorations also helped to confirm the theory.
sentences.cn: 我们的水下考察也有助于证实这个理论.

sentences.en: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.cn: 海滩上有些地方在涨潮时完全淹没在水中。

sentences.en: Some submarines carry many men and stay underwater for several weeks.
sentences.cn: 有些潜水艇能装很多人,并在水下呆好几个星期.

sentences.en: The faster it moved underwater, the quicker the batteries would go flat.
sentences.cn: 它在水下开得越快, 蓄电池的电消耗得也越快.

sentences.en: The ship was underwater when they reached her.
sentences.cn: 他们赶到那艘船时,船已沉到水里了.

sentences.en: The U - boat packs were kept underwater and harried continually.
sentences.cn: 成群结队的德国潜艇被迫潜伏在海底,并且不断地受到困扰.

sentences.en: This machine has been specially adapted for use underwater.
sentences.cn: 这机器是为水下使用而特别改装的.

sentences.en: To do this, scientists have to devise methods using radar and underwater television.
sentences.cn: 为此，科学家还要设计出使用雷达和水下电视的方法。

sentences.en: To do this, scientists have to devise Methods: Using radar and underwater television.
sentences.cn: 为此, 科学家还要设计出使用雷达和水下电视的方法.

sentences.en: We experimented with various underwater techniques as we worked.
sentences.cn: 我们在工作时试验了各种水下技术.

sentences.en: When they left their underwater home they felt quite sad.
sentences.cn: 在离开她们的水下之家时,她们感到依依不舍.

phrases.tran_cn: 水下摄影机，水下照相机
n. 水下爆炸，水中爆炸
水声；水中音；水中声音；水声设备

trans.tran_en: below the surface of an area of water, or able to be used there
Something that exists or happens underwater exists or happens below the surface of the ocean, a river, or a lake
